title: Water
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 14 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR20L
description: In the book Water, students will learn about the many forms of water and where water can be found. Detailed, supportive pictures, a repetitive sentence pattern, and the high-frequency word the support early emergent readers.
meta: ice, lake, ocean, rain, river, snow, water
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /r/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use the high-frequency word the
